div.head: Hed court
div.p:
Curia capitalis Balliuorum de Aberdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimotercio die
mensis Januarij Anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo decimo Quo die sectis vocatis
et curia affiramta Absentes sequuntur

The said day frer' Androw storour' provinciale of the freris carmelitis
exponit ande opinlie declaryt that ser Johne' stiurleing chaplane of
Saint Katherinis alter' within the parroche kirk of Aberdene foundit be
vmquhile Thomas chalmer and his predecessoris ar Infeft of ane an
nuall Rent of v s' of the haile landis and yardis pertenyng to the hous'
of the said freris lying in the grene betuix the vennall passand' ton'
the est part to the saide place the Dene burne on the west part the kingis
gatis on the north' and south partis and has Ressoun' and rycht to rais' the saide
annuele of the haile said' land' yerlie and' termelie As Is contenit in
the chartiris maide tharapone'

The saide day Normonde leslie at command' of the four' bailyeis chargit and
ordanit george tailyeour be his wande of office to fulfile the act' maide to
Jonhne arthour anent ane land liande in vuirkirkgait safer as he sulde do
within terme of law and to pas thareftir to marioun' Duncansone spous' to
the said george and charge hir to fulfile the saide act' insafer as pertenis
till hir within terme of law

head.add: processus domini andree coupar de terra Willelmi Moir

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Andreas coupar capellanus
perpetuus altaris sancti Duthacj confessoris infra ecclesiam parrochialem beati Nicho
laij dictj burgj et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu nouem
solidorum de terra vasta quondam Willelmi moir' Jacente in vico Nauium inter
terram quondam Andree alanj ex parte occidentalj et terram quondam Willelmi
scherar' ex parte orientalj Et communiones vias regias versus boream
et austrum Ad quam accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit In curia tanquam primo
die huius processus Testibus Andrea Wrycht Johne glais' et gilberto
prestoun' seriando et cetera

head.add: processus domini Andree coupar de terra Johannis gouys'

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Andreas coupar
capellanus perpetuus altaris sancti Duthacj confessoris infra ecclesiam
parrochialem beati Nicholaij dictj burgj et protestabatur in forma Juris
pro vno annuo redditu septem solidorum et vndecim denariorum
de quadam terra vasta quondam Johannis gouis Jacente infra dictum
burgum in vico Nauium inter terras quondam Willelmi scherar tam
ex parte occidentali quam ex parte orientali Et communiones vias regias
versus boream et austrum Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo
presentauit In curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus
Andrea Wrycht Johanne glas' et gilberto prestoun' sergeando

head.add: processus domini andree coupar de terra Andree malcomson'

div.p:
Eodem die accedens barram discretus vir dominus Andreas coupar
capellanus altaris sancti Duthaci confessoris infra ecclesiam parrochialem beati Nicholaij dictj
burgj et protestabatur In forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu quinque Solidorum de
quadam terra vasta quondam Andree malcolmesone Jacente infra dictum burgum
in vico superiori ecclesie ex australi parte eisudem inter terram quondam thome prat ex
orientalj ex vna et communies vias Regias versus occidens et boream et terram
quondam thome club versus austrum Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit
In Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Andre Wrycht Johanne
glas' et gilberto prestone sergeando et cetera

The said day master Alexander Setoun' forspekar for george tailyeour' allegijt
that the said george suld nocht fulfill the act' maide betuix him and Jonhne
arthour' anent ane forland lyand in the vuirkirkgait for causs' and
resonis quhilkis he suld schaw eftirwart

Eodem die thomas lammyntoun' conuictus fuit pro perturbio symonis flesour per
assisam Juratam ex ore ade fyf prelocutoris eiusdem et Idem symon' conuictus
pro perturbio dictj thome et alterj emendabit vt Jura volunt Attamen
prenotacio huismodi reperta fuit in dicta symone

The said day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane suorne assis' adam fyf
forspekar that Adnrow baxtar duelland' in Dunydur' is awand to Walter
cullan bailye xxix s' scottis money to be pait within terme of law

The said day Dauid mar exponit that he had ane part of thom'
ogis land and wes redy to pay the annuel tharof protestand' the
proces' led tharapone' suld turne him to na preiudice

div.head: primus processus

head.add: processus dominj Johannis prat de terra quondam Willelmi nory

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes prat
capellanus perpetuus altaris sancte crucis infra ecclesiam beati nicholaij
dictj burgi et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu
vsualis monete scocie sibi et dicto altarj annua
tim debito de quadam terra inter penitus vasta et inhospitata quondam
Willelmi Nory pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico superiori
ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram Donaldj strathachin
ex occidentali ex vna et torrentem ad molendinum discendens ex orientali
partibus ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus boream Ad quam
terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuus in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius
processus Testibus Johanne quhitcors' mercator robert Joffray
Et gilberto prestone sergeando

head.add: Primus processus magistri thome chamer de terra Johnnis hil

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magister thomas chamer
curatus de aberdene ac capellanus perpetuus altaris beate marie virginis
infra ecclesiam parrochialem dictj burgj situati et protestatus fuit in forma
Juris pro vno annuo redditu vj solidorum et octo denariorum vsualis monete
scocie sibi et dicto altari annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto de
quadam terra vasta quondam Johannis hill Jacente in vico viridj dicti
burgj ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram Johannis Ra ex orientali ex vna
et communionem viam regiam qua Itur ad locum fratrum carmelitarum dicti burgj
Ex occidentali partibus ab altera ortum dictorum fratrum versus austrum
et communionem viam regiam versus boream Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile pro dicto annuo redditu preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius
processus testibus Alexandro buk alexandro Donaldson' et Andrea
naughtie sergeando

head.add: primus processus ministrj sancte trinitatis de supradicta terra

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram religiosus vir frater Johannes Arnot
minister domus sancte trinitatis dictj burgj et protestabatur in forma Juris
pro vno annuo redditu sex solidorum et octo denariorum vsualis monete
scocie annautim sibi et dicto loco a longo tempore debito et non soluto

Eodem die accedens ad Barram discretus vir dominus Dauid
Waus collector ac procurator capellanorum collegij ecclesie parrochiali
beati nicholaij de aberdene et protestatus fuit in froma Juris pro
vno annuo redditu trisdecim solidorum et quatuor denariorum
vsualis monete scocie dictis capellanis annuatim debito et a longo
tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam Willelmi cantuly
Jacente in vico Nauium ex occidentali parte eiusdem inter terram
quondam prat ex australi ex vna et terram quondam alexandrj
Waus et Montem sancte Katherine versus occidens Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis
in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus
Testibus

head.add: Tercius processus ministrj sancte trinitatis de terra Jacobi pyot

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes
arnot minister domus sancte trinitatis dictj burgj et protestatus
fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu quinque solidorum vsualis
monete scocie Infra vasta Jacobj pyot Jacente in le grene ex australi
parte eiusdem inter terram alexandri gothray ex oriens preter terram Johannis
torreleitht ex occidentali et communionem viam Regiam versus boream Ad quam
terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus
Testibus Andrea mortymer Donaldo Baxtar Alexander Donaldsone'
et gilberto prestoun' sergeando

head.add: Judicium processus capellanorum de Aberdene de terra thome og

div.p:
Eodem die tribus processibus perlectis per dominum Johannem Waus
collectorem ac procuratorem capellanorum collegij ecclesie beati nicholaij dicti
burgj de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis eiusdem terre
vaste quondam thome og pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico
castri extra portam borealem eiusdem inter terram Johannis Wilyongson'
ex occidentali ex vna et communes vias regias versus boream et austrum
in defectu solucionis vicinis annuj redditus sex solidorum et octo denariorum
dictis capellanis annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto Vnde
dictus dominus Johannes pecijt a nobis secundum vnij formam et effectum huismodi
processus Juris et Justicie complementum sibi fierj de eadem terra
cum pertinenciis Et consequenter dominus Dauid liell capellanis ac prelocutor
dictorum capellanorum nomine eorundem porrexit plegium In manibus Willelmi
scrimgeour sergeandi quod ipse dominus Johannes Waus nomine dictum capellanorum
proprietatem et possessionem legittime recuperauit de dicta terra cum pertinenciis
in defectu solucionis dictj annuj redditus Vnde hora diei legittime
expectata omnibus interesse habenti vocato et nullo comparenti nec opponenti
decretum fuit per Curiam et dat' pro Judicio per os Willelmi
fynne Judicatoris curie quod dictus dominus Johannes nomine dictorum capellanorum
causam suam obtinuit in recuperacione proprietatis dicte terra Super
quibus omnibus et singulis dictus dominus Dauid lyel prelocutorio nomine
quo supra litteras nostras testimoniales Sillaque nostra roborare debita
reuerencia requisit quas eidem caritatine concessimus Anno
die mense in loco prenotatis Coram prouidis et famosis viris

Eodem die tribus processibus deductis et perlectis per dominum
Johannem Waus collectorem ac procuratorem capellanorum collegij
ecclesie perrochialis beati nicholaij dictj burgj de et super recuperacione
proprietatis possessionis eiusdem terre vaste quondam philippi
Dumbrek et Elizibeth Dakir sponse sue pertinenciis Jacente infra
dictum burgum in vico Inferiori ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem
inter terram andree meldrum ex orientali ex vna et terram Johannis
malisone ex occidentali partibus ab altera terram quondam patricij stiklar
versus austrum et terram anteriorem sancti matris marie versus boream
in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus decim solidorum vsualis monete
scocie dictis capellanis annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto vnde
dictus dominus Johannes pecijt a nobis secundum vnij formam et effectum
huismodi processus Juris et Justicie complementum sibi fierj de dicta terra
cum pertinenciis Et consequenter dominus Dauid lyell capellanus ac pre
locutor dictorum capellanorum porrexit plegium in manibus Willelmi
scrimgeour sergeandi quod ipse dominus Johannes Waus nomine dictorum
capellanorum proprietatem de dicta terra legittime recuperauit in
defectu solucionis dictj annuj redditu Vnde hora diei legittime
expectata omnibus interesse habenti vocato et nullo comparenti nec opponenti
decretum fuit per curiam et datum pro Judicio per os Wilellmi
fynne Judicatoris curie quod dictus dominus Johannes nomine dictorum capellanorum
causam suam obtinuit in recuperacione proprietatis dicte terre Super
quibus omnibus et singulis dictus dominus Dauid lyel prelocutorio
nomine quosupra litteras nostras testimoniales sigillaque nostra
roborant debita cum reuerencia procurauit et requisit quas eidem
cariatine concessiis Anno die mense et loco prenotato Testibus
vt supra

The said' day Robert chepman one that ane part and Androw
Mortymare one that vthir part was bundin and oblist be the fathtis
of thar bodiis thar handis vphaldin to stand and abid'
at the ordinance and smale deliverans of James Colison'
and mastir thomas chamer Anent ale debatis conuersiis and clamys
betuix thame and to Comper befor the saide personis' one friday
that next cumis in the hous' of the saide James and the saide personis
tuk one thame to tak the saide debatis to thame and giffurtht
thar deliuerance tharintill

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene' tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo septimo
die mensis Januarij anno quo supra

The said day Robert Jofray grantit him awande till Androw litstar
ix s' quhilkis the bailyeis chargeit him to pay within terme of law

The said day the bailyeis assignit mononday that nixt cumis
to Johne crag till ansuer' to the borgh' fundin on' him be Robert
Jofray for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of fyfty sows' with the
mar' as law will

The said day Wileame loremar grantit him borgh' to Johne'
cuk for ane franche crovne' for Normond' leslie quhilk the bail
yeis chargeit him to pay within terme of law

The said day mage gillespy was conuict' be ane suorne assis'
Johne Colisone forspekar for the wranguis' takin of ane pane
fra the wif of Dauid straloch' for the quhilkis scho wes in ane'
amerciament of the court et cetera

The said day the prowest and bailyeis grantit till allow to James
Colisoun' xiij s' and iiij d' in his male or gerssome for spicery gevin
to our' souerane lordis propyne

head.add: anent the rufe of the kirk

div.p:
The said day the prowest bailyeis counsel and communite warnit
be the hand bell gatharit and Inquerit grantit and consentit that
the rufe of the parris' kirk of the said burgh' suld' stand' as It Is
and to se and consider the faltis in the tymmer and mak thame to be reformyt

The said day Androw mortymer lauchfullye warnit Callit and
nocht comperit till ansuer at the Instance of robert chepman wes
in ane amerciament of the court for falt of perance et cetera

The said day Dauid syme and Wilyeame belty lauchfully warnit callit and
nocht comperit wes in ane amerciament of the court et cetera

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene' Tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiiijto die mensis
Januarij Anno quo supra

The said day Dauid tailyeour' was conuict' be ane suorne assis' Androw
Cullane forspekar for the breking of ane butht wyndok of ane land'
pertenand' to ser Johne' Stirueling for the quhilkis he wes in ane amerciament
of the Court and till amend' as law will and forber' in tyme to cum and'
that wes gevin for dome et cetera

The said day Johne Wilyeamsone lax fischear' and Adam sawar' wes
conuict' be ane suorne' assis' androw Cullane forspekar Ilk ane for tribulance
of vthiris for the quhilkis Ilkane of thame wes in ane amerciament of the
court and till amend' as law will and' forber' In tyme to cum

The said ay day the bailyeis assignit this day viij dayis to Normond'
leslie to preiwe the gudis of airschip clamit to pertene to Androw steuart
as procuratour to Elizibeth leslie the relict' of vmquhile Andro Stevinsone

Eodem die georgeus tailyeour pro se et mariota Duncansone sponsa sua fecit
constituit creauit et nominauit magistrum alexandrum setoun' vicarium de Bothelny
suum verum legittimum et Indubitatum procuratorem actorem factorem dans
et concedens eidem suo procuratori ac suis substitutis pluribus aut vni
suam legittimam et Integram potestatem ac mandatum speciale pro se et nomine
suo ad comparendum Coram preposito et balliuis dicti burgj xxvi die
mensis Janaurij Instantis Et quibuscumque alijs diebus et locis And
respondendum Johanni arthouor Et quibuscumque alijs de et super clameo cuiusdam
terre Jacente in vico superiori ecclesie et cetera Ac in omnibus actionibus et querelis
Promittens de rato et grato In presencia Jacobj colisone vnius balliuorum
Andree cullan et Duncanj craik et cetera

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
vicesimoseptimo die mensis Janaurij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day master Alexander Setoun' producit certane
Ressonis and articulis in ane Roll of paper proportand' that georg
tailyeour and marioun' Duncansone his spous aucht nocht to fulfill the
Act maid' one thame anent ane land' followit be Johne arthour
quhilk is subscriuit with the hand' of ser Johnne sterueling clerk
of the said court quhilk was red et cetera And' ane Instrument of
Sesin of the said land' gevin to the said master Alexander vnder
the Seile of James colisone bailye protestand'
